title: God, Buddha, and Nico-sama
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>I-, it’s finally over.... Maru’s head is going to explode....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>How weak, getting tired from only this much. We’ve only finished part 5 of Nico’s selection of school idol DVD marathon, you know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>How many parts are there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>For now, I’ve prepared up to part 10<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>10!? Maru wonders if Maru can do it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess it can’t be helped then. Here, do your best while you munch on this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Waaah! Bread!! Is this handmade by you, Nico-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s right! I tried to imitate the Noppo bread!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Praise God, praise Buddha, and praise Nico-sama zura~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No! Nico is the number one school idol in the universe, okay!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
